original_title: 39-45 La Propagande Nazie: Le Pouvoir de l'Eglise
overview: While Nazi ideology dominated Europe, Adolf Hitler used all dogmas to divert them to his advantage and feed the cult of his personality. How did the Führer manage to transform the Bible, the Church and Christ himself into instruments of power, winning the support of the Germans? This documentary traces the rise of a little-known theological organization: the “German Christians”, which became the most powerful propaganda tool of the Third Reich.
title: 39-45 Nazi Propaganda: The Power of the Church
